text:
People Are Going Bonkers Over Gully Boy Jukebox, Declare It 'The Album Of The Year' Already!
People Are Going Bonkers Over Gully Boy Jukebox, Declare It 'The Album Of The Year' Already!
If you are still obsessing over Apna Time Ayega from Gully Boy, you would be delighted to know that this movie has 18 songs. The music of the movie was launched yesterday in Mumbai, in the presence of the two superstars Ranveer Singh and Alia Bhatt.
Being the crazy man he is, Ranveer Singh’s energy was at its peak at the music launch event as well. Dressed up in neon green tracksuit, the sea of fans cheered as Ranveer Singh took the centre stage. He sang for the audiences too. It was nothing short of a great concert.
Music lovers are having a gala time since the Gully Boy Jukebox has been released. From artists including Spitfire, Divine, Naezy, Rishi Rich, Ankur Tewari, Dub Sharma to Javed Akhtar, Raghu Dixit, Midival Punditz & Karsh Kale, Jasleen Royal, Kaam Bhari and Ace, a lot of talented artists have contributed to these 18 songs.
Don't Miss 185 SHARES 336 SHARES 544 SHARES 247 SHARES 699 SHARES
Fans are going bonkers even since the Gully Boy Jukebox has been released. So much so, that some of them have already declared it to be the album of the year.
You know the album is mind blowing when you can’t decide which song is your favorite!! #GullyBoyJukebox — AB (@Abhisingh183) January 24, 2019
You know the album is mind blowing when you can’t decide which song is your favorite!! #GullyBoyJukebox — AB (@Abhisingh183) January 24, 2019
You know the album is mind blowing when you can’t decide which song is your favorite!! #GullyBoyJukebox — AB (@Abhisingh183) January 24, 2019
Starring Ranveer Singh, Alia Bhatt, Kalki Koechlin, Zoya Akhtar’s Gully Boy is slated to hit the screens on Feb 14. How excited are you to watch the movie? Tell us in the comments section below. Meanwhile, listen to the Gully Boy Jukebox below.
title: People Are Going Bonkers Over Gully Boy Jukebox, Declare It 'The Album Of The Year' Already!
